fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a player at night. 3 charges

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you shoot a Town member you lose all charges then kill yourself the next night.
- You can select Moby Dick as a target to shoot. He must be shot two times before he dies.
- If you shoot Moby Dick, he deals a basic attack to you the same night.
- After killing Moby Dick, gain permanent powerful defense

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Town goal and live to see Moby Dick die
